original: Ljungskile, Gbgs o. Boh. 1. G. 36 m. Katarina Ekstrand. Barn: Anita f. 37, Viveka 44. — Stud:ex. 25, fil. kand. i Gbg 31. Medarb. i Norrköp. Tidn. 31-32, i Morgontidn. i Gbg 32-40, därefter i Gbgs Handels- o. Sjöf.-Tidn. Föret, ett flert. utr. reportageresor. Utg. litografisaml. Teaterfolk, utfört komp. t. intarsia o. oljemåln. på Sv. Lloyds Saga, oljemåln. t. Sv. Am. Li-niens Stockholm, teckn., utställn. i Gbg. 46 o. i Sthlm 47. Ledare f. Gbgs högsk. journalistkurs 46-47, v. ordf. i Sv. journ rfören. Gbgskrets 45-47, medl. av Publ :klubben sed. 30. Sign.: Hubertus samt (som teckn.) Hub. Led. av Gbgs stads reklamnd, nämndeman.
translated: Ljungskile, Gothenburg and Bohuslän. Married in 1936 to Katarina Ekstrand. Children: Anita born in 1937, Viveka in 1944. Graduated from high school in 1925, Bachelor of Arts in Gothenburg in 1931. Worked for Norrköping Newspaper in 1931-1932, Morning Newspaper in Gothenburg in 1932-1940, then the Gothenburg Trading and Shipping Newspaper. Undertook several investigative reporting trips. Published a collection of lithographs called "Theater People", composed intarsia and oil paintings on the Swedish Lloyd Saga, oil paintings of the Swedish American Liner Stockholm, exhibited drawings in Gothenburg in 1946 and in Stockholm in 1947. Led the Gothenburg University journalism course from 1946 to 1947, served as vice chairman of the Swedish Journalist Association's Gothenburg branch from 1945 to 1947, and was a member of the Public Club since 1930. Signature: Hubertus and (as an artist) Hub. Member of the Gothenburg City Advertising Committee, lay judge.
